page.title: 14Eurosports Village ,Shotley
page.content: Partly in our block is the former Royal Navy training base,which was known as "H.M.S.GANGES". It still has the tall mast which cadets had to climb . Since the Navy left ,the grounds and buildings have been used as an international residential sports and leisure centre. Parties stay here for coaching in a wide range of sports and for general training. The Village is very large,covering over 150 acres,of which 26 acres of playing fields are available for rugby, soccer,hockey,cricket and other games. There is a gymnasium,two sports halls and a 25 metre heated indoor swimming pool. There are courts for tennis, squash and netball and archery and shooting ranges, both indoors and outdoors. When we visited there were 150 people learning judo and Millwall football club were training there.
